Name: Sand:box
About the game: The relaxing 2D particle sandbox, now available on Steam! Remember the retro 'falling sand' games? Sand:box is an improved version of those. Create things with 55+ different materials in an open environment, play around, draw different designs that use interactions between elements, and enjoy the result... or just blow everything up!
